mapper.insert: insert into T_TEACHER (N_ID, C_NAME, N_GENDER, C_COLLEGE, C_OFFICE, C_TEL, C_PERMISSION) values (#{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{college, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{office, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permission, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update T_TEACHER set C_PASSWORD = #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_NAME = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, N_GENDER = #{gender, jdbcType=INTEGER}, C_COLLEGE = #{college, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_OFFICE = #{office, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TEL = #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_PERMISSION = #{permission, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where N_ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select N_ID, C_PASSWORD, C_NAME, N_GENDER, C_COLLEGE, C_OFFICE, C_TEL, C_PERMISSION from T_TEACHER where N_ID = #{id}

select N_ID, C_PASSWORD, C_NAME, N_GENDER, C_COLLEGE, C_OFFICE, C_TEL, C_PERMISSION from T_TEACHER
C_COLLEGE like "%"#{college}"%"
AND C_NAME like "%"#{name}"%"
